answers.answer: I have 2 friends who each had their babies at 32 weeks. I believe they went in to true labor though, so if you are uncomfortable, maybe call your doctor but there is likely no need to run to the hospital this minute.
Thank you very much for your opinions. I get really stressd out n tired often.

There isn't a specific when.  My first pregnancy my water broke at 24 weeks. But my second,   My son was originally scheduled  c-section at 32 weeks for health and safety reason but they ended up at 34 weeks instead.  If your worried call your Obgyn and ask for Apt asap and or advice or go to the e r/birthing center
I had my son at 32 weeks. But i also had a friend that had her baby girl at 24.weeks and she spent a 100days in the nic. But is home healthy...
At 32 weeks was your baby ok n healthy enough to take home ..

He was really healthy. But had to stay in the nic. For a week. I had a horrable pregnancy. And i am with this child so far. Im 17weeks.  But i had preclamcia witch brought him early. And diabetes witch put more weight on him. He came out 5p3o. Thats big for 32weeks. But hes huge now. Hes 4 and like a football player. Lol baby will b fine. Dont worry so much. : )
Thank you.its just this first time mother thing n my insecurities..
Im very afraid of being alone when it does happen

Dont b.. i was by myself and still am. I am a real single mother. No father at all. No money help. Dont even see the *** holes. But it makes u stronger.. and youll see it will make u a more confident mommy.  Youll b fine. Dont panic when it happends. Take a breath and go. Lol

question: when is the earliest that I can go into labor .i am currently 32 almost 33 weeks on friday.i have these "pushing " feelings down there and im not sure what it really is.is it him or am I worried for no reason.this is my first pregnacy  n idk what to do.
title: Early birth .?
